definition: at or in the very same.../suitable/adequate/fitting/proper/to replace/to regard as/to think/to pawn/(coll.) to fail (a student)
to be/to act as/manage/withstand/when/during/ought/should/match equally/equal/same/obstruct/just at (a time or place)/on the spot/right/just at
abbr. for 日本[Ri4 ben3], Japan

sentences.english: But would you like express service or same-day?
sentences.chinese: 不外，您是要快洗效力照舊當日取？

sentences.english: CBRC shall, on the same day as issuing the approval certificate, submit to the Ministry of Commerce the approval certificate stub.
sentences.chinese: 銀監會在代發當日將批准證書存根送商務部。

sentences.english: The banks can handle foreign exchange purchase for official foreign visit groups.
sentences.chinese: 銀行可按當日牌價爲您辦理人民幣與外幣的兌換。

sentences.english: On that day the number of those that were slain in Shushan the palace was brought before the king.
sentences.chinese: 當日，將書珊城被殺的人數呈在王前。

sentences.english: Pay at the door, cash only.
sentences.chinese: 活動當日付於簽到到，接受現金。

sentences.english: Would you like express service or same-day?
sentences.chinese: 您是要快洗服務還是當日取？

sentences.english: The gift was returned to its 70-something-year-old sender in the southern port city of Busan the same day.
sentences.chinese: 當日，這份禮物被退回給釜山市年逾七旬的寄件人。

sentences.english: For the interest class date felt on a public holiday, the lesson will be proponed to a week later.
sentences.chinese: 凡課當日爲公衆假期，當日興趣班順延至下週舉行。

sentences.english: For the interest class date felt on a public holiday, the lesson will be proponed to a week later.
sentences.chinese: 凡課當日爲公衆假期，當日興趣班順延至下週舉行。

sentences.english: Pay him his wages each day before sunset, because he is poor and is counting on it.
sentences.chinese: 要當日給他工價，不可等到日落。

sentences.english: That day, oxen and horses were slaughtered for the feast.
sentences.chinese: 當日殺牛宰馬，大張筵席。

sentences.english: The borrower shall pay interest on each interest payment day.
sentences.chinese: 借款人須於每一付息日當日付息。

sentences.english: It reports five or more account changes on a given day.
sentences.chinese: 當日申報改帳累計達五筆以上者。

sentences.english: The term of entrustment is divided into one-day and five-day validity.
sentences.chinese: 委託期限分爲當日有效和五日有效。

sentences.english: On the afternoon of the same day, more than 200 people blocked Pangyo street office.
sentences.chinese: 當日下午，200餘人堵住了大板橋街道辦。

sentences.english: When you do the exam you must bring the same identity card.
sentences.chinese: 考試當日，您必須使用同一張身份證件參加考試。

definition: the scene (of a crime, accident etc)/(on) the spot/(at) the site
to come and go/to have friendly relations with/in the past/previous
to be present/to be on the scene
in those days/then/in those years/during that time
